name: DeBuffet #plusSUL
description:
deBuffet Have you ever needed to choose one between two options, both being important?  And to consider that your fate is going to completely change after your decision? The deBuffet will question which “skills” will you keep playing with, however, the choice of the least worse is in your hands.

Your objective is to deliver the hamburger in time to your client and so please him. But that can’t be that easy, right? Therefore, Socorro, the waitress which you embody, will fulfil this objective upon “debuffs”, that is, skills which make your gameplay even harder. From that, you have to develop an effective strategy of decision-making, given that, whose reaches the best score among its buddies will have the merit to brag about. So, are you ready?



CONTROLS: DIRECTIONAL KEYS - Move character
SPACE - Interact
MOUSE - Select Debuffs

ATTRIBUTIONS • Youtube Audio Library: Mechanical Clock Ring; Ice Crash Crumble; Shoveling Snow; Whistle Toy; Metallic Twang High.
• Cooking With Attitude by Not From Georgia is licensed under a Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivatives 4.0 International License.
• Service Bell from Picturetosound.com
• SoundEffectsFactory: Dramatic earthquake; Mechanical Clock. "Water, Pouring, A.wav by InspectorJ
• Cartoon Crazy Run Slip Crash S by NintendoNoises
• Broken plates Sound Effect by Sound Clips & No Copyright Songs NintendoNoises

All the other assets, coding, sounds and etc was made by our team.




CREDITS

Kauê Luchetta, 2D Art (Enviroment, Characters)
Antonio Ciceri Herold, 2D Art (UI, Concept)
Jackson de Faria, Programmer
Juliana Scottá, Programmer & Planning
Rafael Meneguzzo, 2D Art (UI) & Game Design
Jogo desenvolvido para a GameJam+ 2020





Theme: Try Not Laugh Diversifiers: Something wrong isn't right & choices and consequences.
#GJ+ #GameJamPlus2021 #sedeSul
